meta.title: About
meta.description: Meet MP - tech consultant helping small businesses get their tech and marketing sorted.

header.heading: Hi, I'm MP
header.subtitle: I help small businesses sort out their tech and marketing — so it actually works.

sections.heading: The short version
paragraphs: I'm a tech consultant based in Surrey, working with small businesses across the UK. I've spent years in enterprise tech — large-scale projects, complex systems, big budgets. Now I help smaller teams get the same results without the complexity (or the price tag).

sections.heading: Why I do this
paragraphs: Small businesses deserve better than overpriced agencies, cookie-cutter solutions, and "experts" who disappear after the invoice is paid. I've seen too many business owners burned by tech projects that promised the world and delivered confusion.

I work differently. I start by understanding what you're actually trying to achieve. Then I tell you honestly what's worth doing — and what isn't. No upselling, no jargon, no solutions looking for problems.

sections.heading: How I work
paragraphs: I use modern tools (including AI) to work faster and smarter. That means quicker turnaround and better value for you. But the tools are just tools — what matters is understanding your business and delivering something that actually helps.
You work with me directly. Not a rotating team, not a junior who's "learning on the job". When you have a question, you get an answer from someone who knows your project inside out.

sections.heading: The boring but important bit
paragraphs: MP Consulting is a trading name of Morfology Ltd, registered in England. I'm based in Farnham, Surrey, but work with clients across the UK (and occasionally beyond).

cta.heading: Want to work together?
cta.description: Let's have a conversation. No pitch, no pressure — just a chat about what you're trying to achieve.
